Package org.apache.coyote

Interface ActionHook

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProcessor, AjpProcessor, Http11Processor
    public interface ActionHook
    Action hook. Actions represent the callback mechanism used by coyote servlet containers to request operations on the coyote connectors. Some standard actions are defined in ActionCode, however custom actions are permitted. The param object can be used to pass and return information related with the action. This interface is typically implemented by ProtocolHandlers, and the param is usually a Request or Response object.
    Author:
    Remy Maucherat

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void action​(ActionCode actionCode, Object param)
      Send an action to the connector.
